> this is how to print a flextable in a R Markdown document
    

```{r}
ft <- head(mtcars)
col_order <- c("cyl", "gear")
ft <- ft[, col_order]
ft <- setorder(ft, cyl, gear)
setDT(ft)
ft <- ft[ , cyl := cyl *30000]
ft <- flextable(ft)
ft <- autofit(ft)
ft <- merge_v(ft, j = c("cyl", "gear"))
ft <- colformat_int(ft, j = c("cyl"),
      big.mark = ",", na_str = "", prefix = "", suffix = "")
ft <- theme_vanilla(ft)
fix_border_issues(ft)

```
